column5: I have read the regs for zone 16 and I have come to the conclusion that crappie is open all year round.  The reason I am questioning this is that I read on another thread that there was opening day for crappie. Am I legal to fish for crappie right now?  I read the exceptions and could not find a statement that would suggest otherwise. thanks
The opening day most are talking about is for Zone 17, 4th Saturday in April.
Thanks.  I also studied zone 15 as well and there didn't look like there was a closed season there either.
Just looked at the regs and as long as the area you fish is not a sanctuary you should be good to go.
